Introduction

8eight was a three-member co-ed group under BIGHIT MUSIC and Source Music consistent of Lee Hyun, Joo Hee and BaekChan. They debuted on August 25, 2007 on MBC's Music Core.

They won the first season of the tv series, MAC’s Show Survival and in 2009, won the ‘Best Mixed Gender Group‘ for their song ‘Without a Heart’.

But sadly then on December 21, 2014, they disbanded, when Joo Hee and BaekChan’s contracts ended. But on February 7, 2020 they released a comeback single.
